name: Super Bike
overview: A motorcycle racing game published in Loadstar #069 and by Free Spirit Software in 1987. Action-packed, fun-filled motor cycle arcade game for the C64. Race the clock in Motocross, Enduro, Supercross or Trials. Fly through the air on spectacular jumps. Bounce over woop-de-doos. Avoid logs, trees, water holes, brick walls, other bikers, etc. as you vie for the gold cup. Thrilling Super Bike action.
